item.title: Blockchain Fundamentals and Key Technologies
item.description: Preface Recently, I’ve been taking the course <COMP7408 Distributed Ledger and Blockchain Technology> at HKU, which has given me a more systematic understanding of the basic concepts of blockchain. Combined with Professor Xiao Zhen’s public course “Blockchain Technology and Applications” from Peking University that I took previously, I’ve come to realize the vastness of the blockchain knowledge system. I plan to update a series of articles to systematically organize the knowledge of blockchain, Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc.
